hadiths.text: Zaid bin Arqam [may Allah be pleased with him] said that the Prophet (ﷺ) used to say:“O Allah, indeed I seek refuge in You from laziness, helpless old age, and stinginess (Allāhumma innī a`ūdhu bika minal-kasali wal-`ajzi wal-bukhl).” And with this chain, from the Prophet (ﷺ), that he used to seek refuge from senility and the punishment of the grave
